EventType.name: Issue Created
EventType.description: This is the 'Issue Created' event type.

FieldConfigScheme.name: Default Issue Type Scheme
FieldConfigScheme.description: Default issue type scheme is the list of global issue types. All newly created issue types will automatically be added to this scheme.

FieldScreen.name: Default Screen
FieldScreen.description: Allows to update all system fields.

FieldScreen.name: Workflow Screen
FieldScreen.description: This screen is used in the workflow and enables you to assign issues

FieldScreen.name: Resolve Issue Screen
FieldScreen.description: Allows to set resolution, change fix versions and assign an issue.

Issue.description: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.
Issue.environment: a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet te

Issue.description: generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.
Issue.environment: se Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web hey there

Issue.description: to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, l

Issue.environment: t is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default
Issue.description:
Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.
It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

Issue.environment: "Neque porro quisquam est qui dolorem ipsum quia dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipisci velit..." "There is no one who loves pain itself, who seeks after it and wants to have it, simply because it is pain..."
Issue.description:
Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.
The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

Issue.environment: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search

IssueType.name: Bug
IssueType.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

IssueType.name: New Feature
IssueType.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.

IssueType.name: Task
IssueType.description: A task that needs to be done.

IssueType.name: Improvement
IssueType.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

IssueTypeScreenScheme.name: Default Issue Type Screen Scheme
IssueTypeScreenScheme.description: The default issue type screen scheme

OSPropertyString.value: For example operating system, software platform and/or hardware specifications (include as appropriate for the issue).

An estimate of how much work remains until this issue will be resolved.
The format of this is ' *w *d *h *m ' (representing weeks, days, hours and minutes - where * can be any number)
Examples: 4d, 5h 30m, 60m and 3w.
This value can not be changed after work has begun on the issue.

PermissionScheme.name: Default Permission Scheme
PermissionScheme.description: This is the default Permission Scheme. Any new projects that are created will be assigned this scheme

PluginVersion.name: Atlassian JIRA - Plugins - OAuth Consumer SPI
Atlassian Gadgets OAuth Service Provider Plugin
Atlassian JIRA - Plugins - OAuth Service Provider SPI
ROME: RSS/Atom syndication and publishing tools
ROME, RSS and atOM utilitiEs for Java
Atlassian JIRA - Plugins - Project Config Plugin
Atlassian JIRA - Plugins - View Issue Panels
Atlassian JIRA - Plugins - Look And Feel Logo Upload Plugin
Atlassian JIRA - Plugins - Closure Template Renderer
Atlassian JIRA - Plugins - Admin Quick Navigation
Atlassian JIRA - Plugins - DevMode - Func Test Plugin
Atlassian JIRA - Plugins - Admin Summary Component

Priority.name: Blocker
Priority.description: Blocks development and/or testing work, production could not run.

Priority.name: Critical
Priority.description: Crashes, loss of data, severe memory leak.

Priority.name: Minor
Priority.description: Minor loss of function, or other problem where easy workaround is present.

Priority.name: Trivial
Priority.description: Cosmetic problem like misspelt words or misaligned text.

ProjectRole.name: Users
ProjectRole.description: A project role that represents users in a project

ProjectRole.name: Developers
ProjectRole.description: A project role that represents developers in a project

ProjectRole.name: Administrators
ProjectRole.description: A project role that represents administrators in a project

Resolution.name: Fixed
Resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

Resolution.name: Won't Fix
Resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.

Resolution.name: Duplicate
Resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

Resolution.name: Incomplete
Resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.

Resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce
Resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.

Status.name: Open
Status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

Status.name: In Progress
Status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.

Status.name: Reopened
Status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

Status.name: Resolved
Status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Status.name: Closed
Status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

Workflow.name: Source Workflow 1
Workflow.descriptor: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE workflow PUBLIC "-//OpenSymphony Group//DTD OSWorkflow 2.8//EN" "http://www.opensymphony.com/osworkflow/workflow_2_8.dtd"> <workflow> <meta name="jira.description">Workflow for testing</meta> <initial-actions> <action id="1" name="Create"> <validators> <validator type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.validator.PermissionValidator</arg> <arg name="permission">Create Issue</arg> </validator> </validators> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="null" status="open" step="1"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueCreateFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">1</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </initial-actions> <steps> <step id="1" name="Open"> <meta name="jira.status.id">1</meta> <actions> <action id="11" name="Start Progress"> <meta name="jira.description">Start progress on the issue</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.AllowOnlyAssignee</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Not Done" status="Done" step="2"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.misc.CreateCommentFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.GenerateChangeHistoryFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">13</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </actions> </step> <step id="2" name="In Progress"> <meta name="jira.status.id">3</meta> <actions> <action id="21" name="Stop Progress"> <meta name="jira.description">Stop Progress On the issue</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.AllowOnlyAssignee</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Not Done" status="Done" step="1"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.misc.CreateCommentFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.GenerateChangeHistoryFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">13</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> <action id="31" name="Close" view="fieldscreen"> <meta name="jira.fieldscreen.id">3</meta> <meta name="jira.description">Close the issue</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">close</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Not Done" status="Done" step="3"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.misc.CreateCommentFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.GenerateChangeHistoryFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">13</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </actions> </step> <step id="3" name="Closed"> <meta name="jira.status.id">6</meta> </step> </steps> </workflow>

Workflow.name: Source Workflow 2
Workflow.descriptor: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE workflow PUBLIC "-//OpenSymphony Group//DTD OSWorkflow 2.8//EN" "http://www.opensymphony.com/osworkflow/workflow_2_8.dtd"> <workflow> <meta name="jira.description">Another Workflow for Testing</meta> <initial-actions> <action id="1" name="Create"> <validators> <validator type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.validator.PermissionValidator</arg> <arg name="permission">Create Issue</arg> </validator> </validators> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="null" status="open" step="1"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueCreateFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">1</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </initial-actions> <steps> <step id="1" name="Open"> <meta name="jira.status.id">1</meta> <actions> <action id="11" name="Go Custom" view="fieldscreen"> <meta name="jira.fieldscreen.id">3</meta> <meta name="jira.description">Go custom on this issue</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">resolve</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Not Done" status="Done" step="2"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.misc.CreateCommentFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.GenerateChangeHistoryFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">13</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </actions> </step> <step id="2" name="Custom State"> <meta name="jira.status.id">10001</meta> <actions> <action id="21" name="Reopen" view="fieldscreen"> <meta name="jira.fieldscreen.id">2</meta> <meta name="jira.description">Reopen the issue</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">resolve</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Not Done" status="Done" step="1"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueFieldFunction</arg> <arg name="field.name">resolution</arg> <arg name="field.value"></arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.misc.CreateCommentFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.GenerateChangeHistoryFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">13</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </actions> </step> </steps> </workflow>

Workflow.name: Destinatiom Workflow
Workflow.descriptor: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE workflow PUBLIC "-//OpenSymphony Group//DTD OSWorkflow 2.8//EN" "http://www.opensymphony.com/osworkflow/workflow_2_8.dtd"> <workflow> <meta name="jira.description">The workflow where we will be transitioning issues</meta> <initial-actions> <action id="1" name="Create"> <meta name="jira.description"></meta> <validators> <validator type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.validator.PermissionValidator</arg> <arg name="permission">Create Issue</arg> </validator> </validators> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="null" status="open" step="2"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueCreateFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">1</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </initial-actions> <steps> <step id="2" name="Custom State 3"> <meta name="jira.status.id">10002</meta> <actions> <action id="11" name="Resolve" view="fieldscreen"> <meta name="jira.fieldscreen.id">3</meta> <meta name="jira.description">Resolve this issue</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">resolve</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Not Done" status="Done" step="3"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.misc.CreateCommentFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.GenerateChangeHistoryFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">13</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </actions> </step> <step id="3" name="Resolved"> <meta name="jira.status.id">5</meta> <actions> <action id="21" name="Go 4" view="fieldscreen"> <meta name="jira.fieldscreen.id">2</meta> <meta name="jira.description">Go 4 on this issue</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">close</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Not Done" status="Done" step="4"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.misc.CreateCommentFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.GenerateChangeHistoryFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.IssueReindexFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="eventTypeId">13</arg> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.event.FireIssueEventFunction</arg> </function> </post-functions> </unconditional-result> </results> </action> </actions> </step> <step id="4" name="Custom State 4"> <meta name="jira.status.id">10003</meta> <actions> <action id="31" name="Go 3" view="fieldscreen"> <meta name="jira.fieldscreen.id">2</meta> <meta name="jira.description">Go back to custom state 3</meta> <restrict-to> <conditions> <condition type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.condition.PermissionCondition</arg> <arg name="permission">resolve</arg> </condition> </conditions> </restrict-to> <results> <unconditional-result old-status="Not Done" status="Done" step="2"> <post-functions> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueFieldFunction</arg> <arg name="field.name">resolution</arg> <arg name="field.value"></arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg name="class.name">com.atlassian.jira.workflow.function.issue.UpdateIssueStatusFunction</arg> </function> <function type="class"> <arg WorkflowScheme.name: Source Workflow Scheme
WorkflowScheme.description: The workflow scheme the project started on

WorkflowScheme.name: Destination Workflow Scheme
WorkflowScheme.description: The workflow scheme we will be mocing the project to
